mcq.statement: Which of the following is the correct completion of the sentence? "The best way to encourage innovative thinking is not to promise financial rewards for ideas, _______".

options.a: But to ensure that the person making the suggestion receives recognition for his contribution
options.b: But to ensure that the person who makes the suggestion will be receiving recognition for his contribution
options.c: But rather by ensuring that the person making the suggestion receives recognition for his contribution
options.d: But rather ensure that suggestion-maker receives recognition for his contribution
